title: the biggest mistake men make that makes them less attractive
description:

transcription: {"text": "When men get the ball fade, it actually accentuates their jawline, which makes them look more masculine. And the same thing with the facial hair. The facial hair can accentuate your jawline or not accentuate. I know some guys who don't have a very strong jawline, so they'll grow out a beard, but one of the problems I'll see is the beard will be bushy on the side, which doesn't accentuate your jawline. For some reason, a lot of my European clients do this. They have bushiness on the sides. And I'm like, that doesn't make you look more masculine. It makes you look like a child. Myron talked about getting hair plugs. The guy who owns this studio got hair plugs. They're very open about it too. Now, when I say hair plugs, they mean the transplant from the back of the head up to the front. This is something that men are doing very frequently. Just like when women tell us they have fake tits, we don't not like them because they're fake, but when you tell women, Hey, I got a hair transplant. If you look good, they just don't care because their hypergamy is not conscious. The hypergamy is based in evolution. It's just going on subconsciously. One of those strange things that happens when you do that.
